snippet: The interior minister and judicial officials said the men had links to a French citizen suspected of seeking to join jihadist fighters in Mali.
abstract: French police arrest four men suspected of seeking to aid or join Islamist militants in Africa, while French air and ground forces continue operations against militants in northern Mali.
lead_paragraph: The interior minister and judicial officials said the men had links to a French citizen suspected of seeking to join jihadist fighters in Mali.

headline.seo: France Arrests 4 It Says Planned to Aid or Join Militants
headline.main: France Arrests 4 It Says Planned to Aid or Join Militants
headline.print_headline: France: Fighting Militancy, At Home and Abroad
